body.name: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Ultra Gentle Foaming Daily Cleanser, Hydrating Face Wash for Sensitive Skin, Removes Makeup & Gently Cleanses Without Over Drying, Hypoallergenic, 16 fl. oz
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
features: 16-fluid ounce bottle of Neutrogena Fragrance Free Ultra Gentle Foaming Facial Cleanser for sensitive skin that gently and effectively cleanses skin without disrupting its natural moisture barrier

The gentle facial cleanser developed by dermatologists works in a new skin-friendly way to leave you with clean yet naturally soft skin. The non-stripping formula washes away excess oil, dirt and removes makeup without over-drying or irritating skin

From a dermatologist recommended skincare brand, this gentle foaming facial cleanser was developed with dermatologists specifically to cleanse sensitive skin. The hydrating cleanser rinses clean, leaving no pore-clogging residue behind

The hypoallergenic facial cleanser is free of fragrance, soaps and dyes and is gentle enough for sensitive skin. The daily foaming cleanser is noncomedogenic, so it rinses clean and won't clog your pores

This daily cleanser is gentle on sensitive skin and makes a great addition to a daily skincare routine. To use, wet face, pump cleanser into hand and work into a foamy lather. Massage gently onto your face and rinse clean
body.description: Neutrogena Fragrance Free Ultra Gentle Daily Foaming Facial Cleanser developed by dermatologists to gently cleanse sensitive skin. The fragrance free wash thoroughly cleanses without disrupting skin's natural moisture balance. This extra gentle face wash works in a new, skin-friendly way to leave you with clean yet naturally soft skin. The non-stripping formula thoroughly removes excess oil, dirt and makeup without over-drying or irritating skin. The hydrating face wash for sensitive skin is free of fragrance, soaps and dyes. The hypoallergenic cleanser rinses clean and is non-comedogenic, so it won't clog your pores. This daily cleanser is gentle on sensitive skin and makes a great addition to a daily skincare routine. To use, wet face, pump cleanser into hand and work into a foamy lather. Massage gently onto your face and rinse clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A little dab goes a long way! Super soft skin after use
reviews.reviewText: First, use only a small amount size of dime should cover face and throat. My first use was today and it is AMAZING! My sensitive skin feels clean, refreshed, but NOT dry. It feels great and exactly what my skin needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long lasting and works good!
reviews.reviewText: It is a large bottle for a good price. It doesn't have any scent, which is perfect for people with sensitive skin. I think a lot goes a long way when using it. I use it with a scrubby to exfoliate my skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Seems to work well, and decent value
reviews.reviewText: Started using this a year or two ago, and just repurchased. I use it daily, no residue and seems to keep my skin well hydrated.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am a fan of Neutrogena, however even though this is fragrance free, I find it to have a bit of a scent that I just don't like. The cleanser itself is great, I don't get that dry feeling, moisturizes well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft and gentle
reviews.reviewText: Makes your face feel so nice and clean. Lathers well too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This lasts a long time
reviews.reviewText: I use this face wash whenever I shower, and I think I'm only halfway through in a number of months. It's a good value for the cost. Feels nice afterwards without drying out my face too much like harsher products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I love this product
reviews.reviewText: I use this when I take showers. It is gentle on my skin, cleans it great and it leaves my skin so soft. Plus it’s priced reasonable. With a pump applicator, it’s easy use in the shower. I just wet a wash cloth and pump it on. I highly recommend it for anyone with sensitive skin or even regular skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Cleanser, Poor Amazon Packaging - Leaked all over other items
reviews.reviewText: I've been purchasing the cleanser for years and it is wonderful. Unfortunately, I won't purchase from Amazon anymore because it was thrown in the box with other items, no packing material and it leaked all over everything. Normally, it is put in a plastic bag and even zip tie the top, so it won't leak. Amazon needs to review their "New Packaging Innovation" plan.
Es una de las mejores limpiadoras que he usado, en precio, calidad, y cantidad. Es para piel mixta
Limpia muy bien sin resecar y a mucho mejor precio que en las farmacias
No lo volvería a comprar aunque es bueno, es muy grande y por consecuencia alto de precioPrefiero un presentación más pequeña
Tenia muchas iluciones con este producto, pero llego todo sucio pegajoso no son las condiciones q deben tener productos de cuidado para la piel y menos de este costo.
